thread.title: A Small Android App called “Call Mom Glamorous Reminder” is now Available
thread.title_full: A Small Android App called “Call Mom Glamorous Reminder” is now Available

author: prbuzz.com
title: A Small Android App called “Call Mom Glamorous Reminder” is now Available
text:
A small Android application called “Call Mom Glamorous Reminder” is now available. Call Mom is a simple app that reminds the user to call their mother. In addition to this, the user can also set the time and the phone number of their mom to call and the app will pop a notification at the defined time which reminds them to call their moms.
Apart from this, Call Mom has a simple and friendly interface that will surely love by its users. For those people who are looking for the best Android app that can remind them to call their moms, Call Mom is the perfect app to consider and use. In the present time, there are huge numbers of apps that are widely available online that offers such features and benefits however it is very imperative to opt for the best one that is worth paying for.
Call Mom Android app is creatively developed and designed to make sure that users keep in touch with their moms all the time. There is no one as special as Mom, so don’t forget to call her. A simple call can make a mom feel special, loved and valued. With the existence and help of this Android app, users will no longer forget to call their moms wherever and whenever they may go. Users of Call Mom Android app are all amazed and satisfied with the awesome features and benefits that this app has to offer.
The developer of Call Mom Reminder app will guarantee all their valued users that they will never be disappointed with the quality of their new Android app. Furthermore, Call Mom app developer will also assure all their respected users that they will never go wrong in using this Android app. With its friendly and simple interface, users are assured that they will surely love using this app. It is also very easy to use and this is one of the top reasons why users are all fulfilled using “Call Mom Glamorous Reminder” app.
Users only need to set the time and the phone number of their mom and the Android app will pop a notification at the defined time. With the amazing benefits and features of Call Mom app, users can be sure that they will get hold of excellent results they are expecting in no time.
To learn more, please check out the app at Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.algonity.apps.callmom and the website: http://www.algonity.com/call-mom-glamorous-reminder/
